name: Zen Republic HQ
description:
VR Metaverse for Virtual Events, NFT Art Showcases and Hanging Out!

After centuries of wars and conflict over who controls the sun, all the inhabited planets of the PX-420 planetary system managed to set aside their differences, agreeing to share the sun's energy, thus the first ever solar-system wide union was formed, called Zen Republic.

Zen Republic HQ is the social platform of Zen Republic metaverse, the headquarters of the solar system, where you can attend virtual events, game shows, NFT art expositions and much more! Socialize, meet new friends and be in the loop of what's cool!

Currently only Oculus headsets are supported, together with Windows PC support for people who don't own a VR headset yet.

More info and upcoming events: http://www.zenrepublic.space/metaverse

Join our discord channel: https://discord.com/invite/G7eE9C9RRg

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/zenrepublicofficial/
